name: k6-game-load-testing
description: K6 load testing for game project

scripts.clean: rm -f reports/*.json reports/*.html && echo 'ðŸ§¹ Cleaned old reports'
scripts.test:smoke: npm run clean && docker-compose run --rm -e GAME=${GAME:-DICE} k6 run --env TEST_TYPE=smoke --out json=reports/smoke-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).json --summary-export=reports/smoke-summary-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).json run.js
scripts.test:load: npm run clean && docker-compose run --rm -e GAME=${GAME:-DICE} k6 run --env TEST_TYPE=load --duration=${DURATION:-60s} --vus=${VUS:-5} --out json=reports/load-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).json --summary-export=reports/load-summary-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).json run.js
